text: aur agar ham ginatee ke chand rozo tak un par azaab karane mein der bhee karen to ye log (apanee sharaarat se) betaammul zarur kahane lagegen ki (hae) azaab ko kaun see cheez rok rahee hai sun rakho jis din in par azaab aa pade to (phir) unake taale na talega aur jis (azaab) kee ye log hansee udaaya karate the vah unako har tarah se gher lega
